oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Timothy Lomparis interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lomperis, Timothy; Caudill, Ed
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lomperis, Timothy; Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lieutenant Timothy J. Lomperis served in the U.S. Army during the Vietnam War. The interview was conducted by Ed Caudill on July 29, 2019 at the Blount County Public Library.
